author: mbluj
body:
#### PR description:
This PR contains two small technical cleanups in the RecoTauTag/RecoTau package:
* removal from `python` directory of two cfi files which are generated automatically with the fillDescriptions mechanism,
* usage of a common helper function to get track of a tau charged hadron candidate instead of a duplication of the function functionality in one of plugins (code is using different logic, but results are identical).

This PR is technical and is expected to not change results.

#### PR validation:

Standard tests with `scram b runtests` and `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos` successful (except a few tests which failed due to problem with accessing input files and which are considered as not relevant)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Small cleanups in RecoTauTag/RecoTau
